languages.text: {n}За спиной сестры Сороритас вы видите Идиру Тласс, согнувшуюся в порыве тошноты. Остальные, кто шел за вами, исчезли — бесследно растворились в пожаре, продолжающем бушевать в двух шагах от вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}За спиной сестры сороритас вы видите Идиру Тласс, согнувшуюся в порыве тошноты. Остальные, кто шел за вами, исчезли — бесследно растворились в пожаре, продолжающем бушевать в нескольких метрах от вас.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere two steps away from you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}За спиной сестры Сороритас вы видите Идиру Тласс, согнувшуюся в порыве тошноты. Остальные, кто шел за вами, исчезли — бесследно растворились в пожаре, продолжающем бушевать в двух шагах от вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Behind Argenta's back, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere metres from you.{/n}

{n}Behind Argenta's back, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere metres from you.{/n}
{n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere metres from you.{/n}
{n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere metres from you.{/n}

{n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere two steps away from you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在阿洁塔身后，你看到伊迪拉·特拉斯弓起了身子，呕吐着。至于其他与你一同前进的人们，已经在离你仅有两步之遥的大火中被烧成了焦炭。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere two steps away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在阿洁塔身后，你看到伊迪拉·特拉斯弓起了身子，呕吐着。至于其他与你一同前进的人们，已经在离你仅有几米之遥的大火中被烧成了焦炭。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Detrás de Argenta puedes ver a Idira Tlass inclinada en un ataque de náusea. Las demás personas que os estaban siguiendo se han disuelto en el fuego que sigue ardiendo a unos pocos pasos de distancia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere two steps away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Detrás de Argenta puedes ver a Idira Tlass inclinada en un ataque de náusea. Las demás personas que os estaban siguiendo se han disuelto en el fuego que sigue ardiendo a solo unos metros de distancia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの後ろに、突然の吐き気のあまりうずくまっているイディラ・トラスが見える。あなたの後を追っていた他の人々はあなたからほんの二歩離れたところで、燃えさかる炎の中で死んでしまった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere two steps away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの後ろに、突然の吐き気のあまりひっくり返ったイディラ・トラスが見える。あなたの後を追っていた他の人々はあなたからほんの数メートル離れたところで、燃えさかる炎の中で死んでしまった。{/n}
{n}アルジェンタの後ろに、突然の吐き気のあまりうずくまっているイディラ・トラスが見える。あなたの後を追っていた他の人々はあなたからほんの二歩離れたところで、燃えさかる炎の中で死んでしまった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Derrière Argenta, vous apercevez Idira Tlass, pliée en deux par la nausée. Le reste de votre groupe s'est désintégré dans les flammes qui continuent de faire rage à deux pas de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere two steps away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Derrière Argenta, vous apercevez Idira Tlass, pliée en deux par la nausée. Le reste de votre groupe s'est désintégré dans les flammes qui continuent de faire rage à quelques mètres de vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hinter Argenta siehst du Idira Tlass vornübergebeugt, ihr scheint übel zu sein. Die Übrigen, die die gefolgt sind, sind in dem Feuer vergangen, das nur zwei Meter von dir entfernt weiterhin tobt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere two steps away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hinter Argenta siehst du Idira Tlass vornübergebeugt, ihr scheint übel zu sein. Die Übrigen, die die gefolgt sind, sind in dem Feuer vergangen, das wenige Meter von dir entfernt weiterhin tobt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın arkasında, mide bulantısından iki büklüm olmuş İdira Tlass'ı görüyorsun. Peşinden gelen diğerleriyse iki adım ötende ortalığı kasıp kavurmaya devam eden yangında yitip gitmişler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind Argenta, you see Idira Tlass doubled over in a fit of nausea. The rest of the people who were following you have withered away in the fire that continues to rage mere two steps away from you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta'nın arkasında, mide bulantısından iki büklüm olmuş İdira Tlass'ı görüyorsun. Peşinden gelen diğerleriyse iki adım ötende ortalığı kasıp kavurmaya devam eden yangında yitip gitmişler.{/n}
